item.description:
All attendees must read, understand and agree to the waiver/liability policy as outlined on this website.

starting at Cherry Mountain Trailhead (Rt 115)

Back to here hike 1.70 mi/1 hr 43 min/+1719 ft on the Cherry Mountain Trail
Leaving NH 115 on a logging road, the trail passes straight through an old log yard and continues straight ahead, where another road diverges right.
hike 0.20 mi/11 min/+178 ft on the Cherry Mountain Trail
The trail becomes a footpath and ascends steadily on an old roadbed, climbing higher above the brook that it parallels, and passes a spring left. The trail reaches the ridge crest, and a spur path turns left and climbs to the summit of Mt. Martha, where it meets Martha’s Mile.
to Mt Martha
hike 0.80 mi/37 min/-299 ft on the Martha's Mile
It leaves the summit of Mt. Martha, descends moderately with excellent footing, then ascends a very short steep pitch. It swings south and climbs the ledge to the summit of Owl's Head.
to Owls Head (Mt Martha)

Totals
Distance 2.70 mi
Time 2 hr 31 min
Elev Gain +2034 ft
Elev Loss -435 ft
Elev Change +1598 ft

Driving Directions
Show in Google Earth
Download to GPS

Back to here hike 0.80 mi/37 min/+299 ft on the Martha's Mile
It leaves the ledge at the summit of Owl’s Head, swings north, then sharp left. It descends a very short steep pitch, then descends easily to a col and climbs moderately, with excellent footing, to the summit of Mt. Martha.
to Mt Martha
hike 0.20 mi/11 min/-178 ft on the Cherry Mountain Trail
The Cherry Mountain Trail descends from the ridge crest; a spur path turns right and climbs to the summit of Mt. Martha, where it meets Martha’s Mile. The main trail passes a spring right then descends steadily along the upper bank of Carter Brook. The trail becomes an old roadbed.
hike 1.70 mi/1 hr 43 min/-1719 ft on the Cherry Mountain Trail
The Cherry Mountain Trail continues on a logging road, passes straight through an old log yard and arrives at NH 115.
to Cherry Mountain Trailhead (Rt 115)

Totals
Distance 5.40 mi
Time 5 hr 2 min
Elev Gain +2469 ft
Elev Loss -2469 ft
Elev Change 0 ft
item.name: CHERRY MOUNTAIN
